author: Ivan Mehta
title: Zoom is a godforsaken mess — but it can be fixed
description: Two years ago, after Facebook’s Cambridge Analytica scandal came to the fore, there was a new story of the social network’s privacy and security mishap every other day. In the past couple of weeks, video conferencing Zoom has found itself in a similar boat. S…
content:
